title: By the King, a proclamation whereas we have fully resolved to use our utmost endeavours for the preservation of the true religion established in this kingdom, to which we ... have thought fit to command all popish priests and jesuites ... to depart out of, and not return or come into this our kingdom ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,
